column5: I am thinking that the weather was a big factor? Simcoe like Lake Erie can spoil you? 24 pounds of bass here in Ohio on any other lake besides Lake Erie is probably a lock on first.  Almost a 5 pound average? That is a pretty good deal almost anywhere?  I guessing it was for sure.  Just check out the winning limits from the previous 5 years.  I think the only year it was lower was last year.
http://www.bassmaster.com/video/2013-bass-pro-shops-northern-open-3-weigh-archive   Just some perspective from Lake Erie.
Anyone have the link?  Thanks   BTW Big Jim is the star of the stage this year.
.found old ones are they streaming it this year
YUP FOUND IT  http://www.nationalprostaff.com/v554-bps+lake+simcoe+open+live+feed
my buddy Frank was on them during the prefish. Lets hope he makes the stage.
when does the live streaming start? 2PM?
so are you saying you didnt need me to get the link
Living in the past there bud?
LOL  It,s off air right now.  It will go live.  The link is good.
27lbs out of couch WOW!!!
What did I miss, was that feed from 2012?  Anyone have a link?
LOL No it was lake simcoe.
A high of 50 here today and rainy and blowing, hope they have better conditions there!
A high of 50 here today and rainy and blowing, hope they have better conditions there! Nope lol  They shut down simcoe and ran couch only  Live link anyone?

LOL Matt, Simcoe is a big lake, probably as much fun as Lake Erie would be today in a bass boat.  That link keeps show the 2012 tournament for me, but the time shows 4pm, so maybe the live link starts at 4?
They shut down simcoe and ran couch only    Not a chance Matt.  Phil,thats what Im thinking.

LOL Matt, Simcoe is a big lake, probably as much fun as Lake Erie would be today in a bass boat.  That link keeps show the 2012 tournament for me, but the time shows 4pm, so maybe the live link starts at 4? awesome thank you  Ya I have been out on simcoe in some very rough water, it wouldnt be the simcoe open without 6 footers tho lol  Safe bet is to shut it down, I heard that the insurance for the event limits them.  Good luck to all
I fished the first opener. We got soaked first 5 minutes in. All day it 4+
CSFL has tweeted a few results.First place went to Paul Castellano and Taro Murata with 24.1 lbs.
Paul Castellano!!!!! Awesome!!!!  A working fisherman! He deserves it 10000%.  I'm sure that'll ruffle some of the hard core tournie guys...  I'm sure Vince is proud!!!
Theres been some great prefish reports.  I guess the weather played a big part. Some of the reports would of made me believe a 30+ bag would of won.
Paul fishes and guides Erie....he can work that rough water like no ones business.  An Erie boy wins on Simcoe.  :clapping:
Paul fishes and guides Erie....he can work that rough water like no ones business.  An Erie boy wins on Simcoe.  :clapping:  Simcoe has become an Erie if you really think about it.
Surprised a 24lb bag won..
http://www.orilliapacket.com/2014/10/18/angling-duo-quadruples-the-weight-of-its-catch-at-last-years-lake-simcoe-open-to-win-this-years-event

Surprised a 24lb bag won..  I am thinking that the weather was a big factor? Simcoe like Lake Erie can spoil you? 24 pounds of bass here in Ohio on any other lake besides Lake Erie is probably a lock on first.  Almost a 5 pound average? That is a pretty good deal almost anywhere?
